Articles.Content:
Hi there, I don't know if this might be the proper thread, but thought I'd share my simple, custom made flag, after my country.

For any of you who might be interested feel free to download.

Anyways, why not a Flag sharing thread? So I invite you post yours.

Please excuse me, but unless you intend to use your flag as a flying carpet, I do not think it is a (space)craft. So, this doesn't belong here, as this is spacecraft exchange...

I like your design though!

MY FLAG IS A FLYING CARPET HOW DARE YOU!!?

back to business here is my FLYING CARPET!

my flag is a flying carpet how dare you!!?

Back to business here is my flying carpet!

exterminate.
